%% Project Gantt chart (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
gantt
    title Ecommerce webapp — May to September 2025
    dateFormat  YYYY-MM-DD
    axisFormat  %b

    %% Legend: use 'done' to mark completed tasks; adjust IDs and dates as needed.

    section Phase: Planning
    Project kickoff & requirements     :done, kickoff, 2025-05-01, 7d
    Repo review & initial backlog      :done, backlog, 2025-05-08, 6d
    Architecture design (IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController)   :done, arch, 2025-05-15, 10d

    section Phase: Design
    Data model & DB schema             :done, dbschema, 2025-05-28, 7d
    API design & contracts             :done, apidesign, 2025-06-05, 7d
    UI/UX wireframes & flows           :designui, 2025-06-12, 10d

    section Phase: Implementation (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)
    Boilerplate, routing, auth        :backend-boiler, 2025-06-24, 10d
    Products, Cart models & controllers:backend-products, after backend-boiler, 12d
    Orders & Payment integration       :backend-orders, after backend-products, 14d
    Admin endpoints and image uploads  :backend-admin, after backend-orders, 10d

    section Phase: Implementation (IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode)
    Frontend scaffold & routing       :frontend-skel, 2025-06-24, 8d
    Product listing, detail, search    :frontend-products, after frontend-skel, 16d
    Cart & Checkout UI (IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)   :frontend-checkout, after frontend-products, 14d
    Admin UI (IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream)     :frontend-admin, 2025-08-01, 14d

    section Phase: Integrations & Quality
    Cloudinary integration & testing  :int-cloud, 2025-07-20, 7d
    PayPal integration & e2e checkout  :int-paypal, after backend-orders, 10d
    Logging, monitoring & healthcheck  :int-monitor, 2025-08-10, 7d

    section Phase: CI / Tests / Docs
    CI pipeline (IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic)     :ci, 2025-08-15, 7d
    Unit & integration tests           :tests, after ci, 14d
    Documentation & diagrams finalize :docs, 2025-09-01, 14d

    section Phase: Release
    Pre-release QA & bugfixes         :qa, 2025-09-15, 7d
    Release & deploy                  :release, 2025-09-24, 3d
    Post-release monitoring           :monitor, 2025-09-28, 3d

    %% Notes: adjust task durations and dependencies to match team velocity.
